Hi, I am Mekhala Kumar!  I am passionate about utilizing data in order to solve social issues.My research interests include migration, public health, and gender economics. My background includes a Social Data Science masterâ€™s degree from the University of Massachusetts Amherst and an undergraduate degree in Applied Mathematics and Economics from FLAME University.  Additionally, I have been practicing Karate for over a decade and hold a second DAN black belt, which has enhanced my leadership and organization skills.  This site contains the different projects I have undertaken. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions.
